Detailed Description

View sub class managing a octree.

This class is designed as a base class for view sub classes needing an octree.

Abstract class, because it makes no sense to assign this class to a Robot since the view model provided by this class is the same as by View.

Definition at line 26 of file octree_view.h.

Member Function Documentation

void OctreeView::init ( const WorldInformation &  world_information  )  [virtual]

Although init is trivial, it is nice to have a default constructor in virtual inherited classes. Otherwise every arbitrary deep sub class has to call the non-default constructor. Call this method before using any other method of View.

Reimplemented from View.

Reimplemented in SphericView.
